markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cerulean Scourge](/Equipment.aspx?ID=692)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Injury" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=97" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 254 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 1,450 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Two Actions" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Made from a carefully distilled blend of serpentine hemotoxins, the fast-acting cerulean scourge is infamous for transforming the blood vessels near the original wound, which glow with a bright blue light before painfully bursting.

**Saving Throw** DC 36 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 9d6 poison damage (1 round); **Stage 2** 12d6 poison damage (1 round); **Stage 3** 15d6 poison damage (1 round)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Cerulean Scourge
